question: Can CMB305 be used against sarcomas?
ideal_answer: Yes, the CMB205 vaccine is aimed at synovial sarcoma and myxoid/round cell liposarcoma patients.

snippets.text: CMB305 induces NY-ESO-1 specific T cell responses in both SS and MRC patients and these patients had excellent overall survival (OS) outcomes in the initial phase I study.
Data suggesting this vaccine may improve OS for SS and MRCL patients is exciting but early, and on-going work is testing the impact of CMB305 on patient outcomes.
The potential of the CMB305 vaccine regimen to target NY-ESO-1 and improve outcomes for synovial sarcoma and myxoid/round cell liposarcoma patients.
